title: Gabriel Boric, the Victory of the Pinochetist Far Right in Chile, and Donald Trump
snippet: But in all of this, there is a clear culprit: Chile’s current president, the leftist Gabriel Boric, incapable of delivering a single one of his major projects or transformation promises over four years.

title: What Happened to Gabriel Boric’s Leftist Promises for Chile? - The New York Times
snippet: President Gabriel Boric of Chile is not eligible for re-election this year because of term limits.Credit...Dave Sanders for The New York Times ... Nov. 15, 2025

title: 2025 Chilean general election - Wikipedia
snippet: In a press conference after meeting President Gabriel Boric at La Moneda, Orrego ruled out a presidential run, stating, "My only plan is to be governor for the next four years," and said, "We'll have to look for other leaderships."
